definition.text: Exit target rate is the target rate set on the initial targets definition, in the close stage of the strategy.

translations.text: Exit target rate es la tasa objetivo establecida en la definici√≥n de objetivos inicial, en la etapa final de la estrategia.

paragraphs.text: Refresh this concepts by reading about the initial target definitions at the trading system.
initialValue allows resetting the initial state of the node to an arbitrary value.
